repair_recommendation.description: The scratch on the rear door can be repaired through sanding and repainting. No part replacement is necessary.

severity_explanation: The damage is classified as minor due to the cosmetic nature of the scratch, which does not affect the vehicle's structural integrity or functionality.
cost_breakdown: Repair costs are estimated based on the need for sanding, repainting, and labor. The minimum cost reflects basic cosmetic repair, while the maximum accounts for potential refinishing and labor variations.
factors_considered: Extent of damage (30% of part affected)
Repair time and cost estimates based on industry standards
